name: Falling Ball - Desmos edition
description:
This is a Trijam entry.

In the game, you need to keep the red ball on the screen as long as possible. If you reach a score of 25 you win (we shortened the game for the jam's sake).

We have no file for you to download because the whole game is made in Desmos graphing calculator: https://www.desmos.com/calculator/roths90tca
Keep in mind it can work properly only in fullscreen.

We don't expect to make a serious competition, yet we had a good laugh while coming up with it, so the entire thing is worth it.

P.S. The cover image is our concept art, some features displayed are not found in the game.
